metadata.title: CVE-2019-6439 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: examples/benchmark/tls_bench.c in a benchmark tool in wolfSSL through 3.15.7 has a heap-based buffer overflow.

notes.note: mdeslaur> issue only in example code

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
